body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Andrew Price and the customer's name is Pamela Hughes.  The conversation is about a random business (a Web Design Agency ) and is a conversation about customer service.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Andrew Price, and I am with Creative Web Designs. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Andrew, I need some help with my website.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Pamela. Could you please tell me your last name for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Pamela Hughes! To better assist you, could you also provide me with your email address?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! Thank you for that information. What specific issues are you experiencing with your website?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I’ve noticed that my site is loading very slowly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how frustrating that can be. Our team can help optimize it for better performance.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That sounds fantastic. I appreciate your help, Andrew.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome, Pamela! Thank you for your time today. If you have any more questions, feel free to reach out.
